mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEM (USRID, PASSWD, NM, EMAIL, ROLEID, MEMSTAT, INTRO, LOGATMCNT, CHGPASSDT, BANKNM, BANKACNT, BANKACNTOWR) VALUES (#{usrId}, #{passwd}, #{nm}, #{email}, #{roleId}, #{memStat}, #{intro}, #{logAtmCnt}, #{chgPassDt}, #{bankNm}, #{bankAcnt}, #{bankAcntOwr})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEM WHERE usrId=#{usrId} and passwd=#{passwd}
SELECT * FROM MEM WHERE nm=#{nm} and email=#{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEM WHERE usrId = #{usrId} AND nm = #{nm} AND email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEM SET passwd = #{passwd} WHERE usrId = #{usrId}
